// src/components/pipelines/PipelineStats.jsx
import React from'react';import{Activity,Timer,TrendingUp,AlertCircle}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PipelineStats=_ref=>{let{stats}=_ref;const statCards=[{title:'Total Builds',value:stats.totalBuilds,icon:Activity,color:'blue'},{title:'Success Rate',value:`${stats.successRate}%`,icon:TrendingUp,color:'green'},{title:'Avg Duration',value:stats.averageDuration,icon:Timer,color:'purple'},{title:'Failure Rate',value:`${stats.failureRate}%`,icon:AlertCircle,color:'red'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:statCards.map((stat,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white p-6 rounded-lg shadow",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`flex items-center justify-between mb-2`,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`p-2 rounded-lg bg-${stat.color}-50`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(stat.icon,{className:`w-5 h-5 text-${stat.color}-500`})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-sm text-gray-500",children:"Last 24h"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-sm font-medium text-gray-500",children:stat.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-2xl font-semibold text-gray-900",children:stat.value})]})]},index))});};export default PipelineStats;
